block_comment: This block of Verilog code performs display generation based on the positive edge of 'pi_dqs_found_done'. The block uses an always statement to monitor the positive edge of the 'pi_dqs_found_done' signal. If a rising edge is detected and if reset ('rst') is not active, the block executes a "$display" statement. This effectively prints out a message ("PHY_INIT: Phaser_In DQSFOUND completed at %t") along with the current simulation time, which is fetched using the "$time" system function.
